entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider releasing #107333 into dotnet 9 #109060
  • Cannot export RSAParameters from X509Certificate2 in .NET 9 RC2 #109059
  • GitHub bot has started pinging owners when the area of a closed issue changes. #109058
  • More precise option to identify CPU spikes/burst using Open Telemetry #109056
  • Behaviour of exceptions in `List<T>.LastIndexOf` doesn't match with documentation #109054

Closed

  • Length of the "White Heavy Check Mark" #109055
  • [API Proposal]: Infinite stack #109023
  • Add custom entry resolver when using `DllImportAttribute` #1906
  • [Perf] Regressions on Multiple platforms, 8/8/2024 11:52:00 PM #106345
    9.0.0
  • Performance Fundamental: Net 8 -> Net 9 Manual Comparison Report #106824
    9.0.0
  • Process.Start opens explorer itself instead of URL #108817

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete duplicate blank issue template. #109057
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.58, windows: 130.0.6723.59 #109053
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add tests for assigning dataflow values to generic parameters through MakeGenericType #106832
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
